subject: Re: [junit] Re: Test-friendly, but not caller-friendly?
msgSnippet: ... I tried, but there is plain text at the top of the file (before the preamble), so neither of my browsers will render it. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger ::
messageBody:
